subject: Fwd: Hello beneficiary,
body:
Greetings Phyllis,

In regards to the USD$72,800.000.00 here in your name then it's my pleasure
to ask you to know how and where method of payment you will like to be
receiving the funds, follow by you're expected to pay $175.00 for your
payment files renewal fee as i explained to my first message, and after the
fee is paid and your payment files here is renewed then we can proceed
immediately for the release of the funds to you upon your request and
direction of payment method to receive the funds please kindly advice.

Note, i am here ready to proceed with your transaction immediately upon
your compliment accordingly thanks.

Yours faithfully,

Mr. Robert J Carter
International Settlement Payment Coordinator Unit.
